title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 100.12 - Road service permit
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 100.12 - Road service permit

State Regulations

Authorization issued by the Thruway Authority on payment of
a prescribed fee permitting a vehicle to enter the Thruway system to make
repairs to a parked disabled vehicle or to reenter the Thruway system after
having exited for repairs and to obtain parts for repairs to a parked disabled
vehicle. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
100.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
